cmp: 召 ((surname)/name of an ancient state, to call together/to summon/to convene)
mng: according to, in accordance with, to shine, to illuminate, to reflect, to look at (one's reflection), to take (a photo), photo, as requested, as before

exm.mng: according to, in accordance with, in the light of, on the basis of
to consult a reference, to refer to (another document)
in accordance with, to follow (the rules)
a diplomatic note, letter of understanding or concern exchanged between governments
to shine on, to light up, to irradiate
